body: Hiding the age has it’s moments. Hiding the age here would be unnecessary. It adds to the context and naughtiness of the story.
You dont really nees to hide the age on this site, you just see that in a lot of doujin typesetting cause other sites need you to hide it
Mf didn't even hide the age, the mf turned it into a title.
If you click through the pages really fast this makes kinda like a slow frame rate video.
